page.title: 03Favourite Things, Evesham.
page.content: These are some of my{favourite things. At{home}I like watching{television} because it shows you interesting things or shows you adventure stories.At{School}I like P.E. because we do exercises and get away from written work. On{days out}I like going to Safari parks like West Midland Safari Park. On{holidays}I like going to fairs because I like going in a bumper car. My favourite{food}is mashed potatoes and yorkshire puddings. I like it best with gravy. My favourite{sport}is running I like long distance running best because it gets me tired out. My favourite{t.v. programme is Doctor Who because I like Daleks. My favourite{computer program is Space-Adventure. My favourite {School}work is Math's.
